ne37:67.2: “idam, bhante, kapilavatthu iddhanceva phitanca bahujannam akinnamanussam sambadhabyuham, so kho aham, bhante, bhagavantam va payirupasitva manobhavaniye va bhikkhu sayanhasamayam kapilavatthum pavisanto bhantenapi hatthina samagacchami, bhantenapi assena samagacchami, bhantenapi rathena samagacchami, bhantenapi sakatena samagacchami, bhantenapi purisena samagacchami, tassa mayham, bhante, tasmim samaye mussateva bhagavantam arabbha sati, mussati dhammam arabbha sati, mussati sangham arabbha sati.
ne37:67.3: Tassa mayham, bhante, evam hoti ‘imamhi caham sayanhasamaye kalam kareyyam, ka mayham gati, ko abhisamparayo’”ti.
ne37:68.1: “Ma bhayi, mahanama, ma bhayi, mahanama, apapakam te maranam bhavissati, apapika kalankiriya.
ne37:68.2: Catuhi kho, mahanama, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
ne37:68.4: Idha, mahanama, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti, itipi so bhagava araham …pe… buddho bhagavati.
ne37:68.9: Seyyathapi, mahanama, rukkho pacinaninno pacinapono pacinapabbharo, so mulacchinno katamena papateyya”ti?
ne37:68.10: “Yena, bhante, ninno yena pono yena pabbharo”ti.
ne37:68.11: “Evameva kho, mahanama, imehi catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
ne37:68.12: Ma bhayi, mahanama, ma bhayi, mahanama, apapakam te maranam bhavissati, apapika kalankiriya”ti.
ne37:75.1: Bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ne37:75.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu bhagavato civarakammam karonti “nitthitacivaro bhagava temasaccayena carikam pakkamissati”ti.
ne37:75.3: Tena kho pana samayena isidattapurana thapatayo sakete pativasanti kenaci deva karaniyena.
ne37:75.4: Assosum kho isidattapurana thapatayo “sambahula kira bhikkhu bhagavato civarakammam karonti.
ne37:76.1: Atha kho isidattapurana thapatayo magge purisam thapesum “yada tvam, ambho purisa, passeyyasi bhagavantam agacchantam arahantam sammasambuddham, atha amhakam aroceyyasi”ti.
ne37:76.2: Dvihatiham thito kho so puriso addasa bhagavantam duratova agacchantam, disvana yena isidattapurana thapatayo tenupasankami, upasankamitva isidattapurane thapatayo etadavoca—
ne37:76.3: “ayam so, bhante bhagava agacchati araham sammasambuddho, yassadani kalam mannatha”ti.
ne37:77.1: Atha kho isidattapurana thapatayo yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu, upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandhimsu.
ne37:77.2: Atha kho bhagava magga okkamma yena annataram rukkhamulam tenupasankami, upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
ne37:77.3: Isidattapurana thapatayo bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu, ekamantam nisinna kho isidattapurana thapatayo bhagavantam etadavocum—
ne37:78.1: “Yada mayam, bhante, bhagavantam sunoma ‘savatthiya kosalesu carikam pakkamissati’ti, hoti no tasmim samaye anattamanata hoti domanassam ‘dure no bhagava bhavissati’ti.
ne37:78.2: Yada pana mayam bhante bhagavantam sunoma ‘savatthiya kosalesu carikam pakkanto’ti, hoti no tasmim samaye anattamanata hoti domanassam ‘dure no bhagava’ti …pe….
ne37:79.1: Yada pana mayam, bhante, bhagavantam sunoma ‘kasisu magadhesu carikam pakkamissati’ti, hoti no tasmim samaye anattamanata hoti domanassam ‘dure no bhagava bhavissati’ti.
ne37:79.2: Yada pana mayam, bhante, bhagavantam sunoma ‘kasisu magadhesu carikam pakkanto’ti, anappaka no tasmim samaye anattamanata hoti anappakam domanassam ‘dure no bhagava’ti.
ne37:80.1: Yada pana mayam, bhante, bhagavantam sunoma ‘magadhesu kasisu carikam pakkamissati’ti, hoti no tasmim samaye attamanata hoti somanassam ‘asanne no bhagava bhavissati’ti.
ne37:80.2: Yada pana mayam bhante bhagavantam sunoma ‘magadhesu kasisu carikam pakkanto’ti, hoti no tasmim samaye attamanata hoti somanassam ‘asanne no bhagava’ti …pe….
ne37:81.1: Yada pana mayam, bhante, bhagavantam sunoma ‘kosalesu savatthim carikam pakkamissati’ti.
ne37:81.2: Hoti no tasmim samaye attamanata hoti somanassam ‘asanne no bhagava bhavissati’ti.
ne37:82.1: Yada pana mayam, bhante, bhagavantam sunoma ‘savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame’ti hoti anappaka no tasmim samaye attamanata, hoti anappakam somanassam ‘asanne no bhagava’”ti.
ne37:83.1: “Tasmatiha, thapatayo, sambadho gharavaso rajapatho, abbhokaso pabbajja, alanca pana vo, thapatayo, appamadaya”ti.
ne37:83.2: “Atthi kho no, bhante, etamha sambadha anno sambadho sambadhataro ceva sambadhasankhatataro ca”ti?
ne37:83.3: “Katamo pana vo, thapatayo, etamha sambadha anno sambadho sambadhataro ceva sambadhasankhatataro ca”ti?
ne37:84.1: “Idha mayam, bhante, yada raja pasenadi kosalo uyyanabhumim niyyatukamo hoti, ye te ranno pasenadissa kosalassa naga opavayha, te kappetva ya ta ranno pasenadissa kosalassa pajapatiyo piya manapa, ta ekam purato ekam pacchato nisidapema, tasam kho pana, bhante, bhagininam evarupo gandho hoti.
ne37:84.2: Seyyathapi nama gandhakarandakassa tavadeva vivariyamanassa, yatha tam rajakannanam gandhena vibhusitanam.
ne37:84.3: Tasam kho pana, bhante, bhagininam evarupo kayasamphasso hoti, seyyathapi nama tulapicuno va kappasapicuno va, yatha tam rajakannanam sukhedhitanam.
ne37:84.4: Tasmim kho pana, bhante, samaye nagopi rakkhitabbo hoti.
ne37:84.7: Na kho pana mayam, bhante, abhijanama tasu bhaginisu papakam cittam uppadenta, ayam kho no, bhante, etamha sambadha anno sambadho sambadhataro ceva sambadhasankhatataro ca”ti.
ne37:85.1: “Tasmatiha, thapatayo, sambadho gharavaso rajapatho, abbhokaso pabbajja.
ne37:85.3: Catuhi kho, thapatayo, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
ne37:86.2: Idha, thapatayo, sutava ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti itipi so bhagava araham …pe… buddho bhagavati, dhamme …pe…
ne37:86.3: sanghe …pe… vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati, muttacago payatapani vossaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato appativibhattam.
ne37:86.4: Imehi kho, thapatayo, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
ne37:87.1: Tumhe kho, thapatayo, buddhe aveccappasadena samannagata itipi so bhagava araham …pe… buddho bhagavati, dhamme …pe…
ne37:87.3: yam kho pana kinci kule deyyadhammam, sabbam tam appativibhattam silavantehi kalyanadhammehi, tam kim mannatha, thapatayo, katividha te kosalesu manussa ye tumhakam samasama yadidam danasamvibhagehi”ti?
ne37:87.4: “Labha no, bhante, suladdham no, bhante, yesam no bhagava evam pajanati”ti.

ne37:165.1: “Silavato, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me avippatisaro jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.2: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam silavato avippatisaro jayeyya.
ne37:165.3: Avippatisarina, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me pamojjam jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.4: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam avippatisarino pamojjam jayeyya.
ne37:165.5: Pamuditena, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me piti jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.6: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam pamuditassa piti jayeyya.
ne37:165.7: Pitimanassa, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me kayo passambheyya’ti.
ne37:165.8: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam pitimanassa kayo passambheyya.
ne37:165.9: Passaddhakayassa, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kintaham sukham vediyeyyan’ti.
ne37:165.10: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam passaddhakayo sukham vediyeyya.
ne37:165.11: Sukhino ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me samadhi jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.12: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam sukhino samadhi jayeyya.
ne37:165.13: Samahitassa, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kintaham yathabhutam pajaneyyan’ti.
ne37:165.14: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam samahito yathabhutam pajaneyya.
ne37:165.15: Yathabhutam pajanata, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me nibbida jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.16: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam yathabhutam pajananto nibbindeyya.
ne37:165.17: Nibbindantena, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me virago jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.18: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam nibbindanto virajjeyya.
ne37:165.19: Virajjantena, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me vimutti jayeyya’ti.
ne37:165.20: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam virajjanto vimucceyya.
ne37:165.21: Vimuttena, ananda, na cetana karaniya ‘kinti me vimuttinanadassanam uppajjeyya’ti.
ne37:165.22: Dhammata esa, ananda, yam vimuttassa vimuttinanadassanam uppajjeyya”ti.
ne37:221.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, dhamma cakkhuna pannaya ca sacchikatabba, atthi dhamma satiya pannaya ca sacchikatabba, atthi dhamma kayena pannaya ca sacchikatabba, atthi dhamma pannaya veditabba, pannaya ca sacchikatabba.
ne37:222.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma cakkhuna pannaya ca sacchikatabba?
ne37:222.2: Dibbacakkhu suvisuddham atikkantamanusakam cakkhuna pannaya ca sacchikatabbam.
ne37:223.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma satiya pannaya ca sacchikatabba?
ne37:224.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma kayena pannaya ca sacchikatabba?
ne37:224.2: Iddhividha nirodha kayena pannaya ca sacchikatabba.
ne37:225.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma pannaya veditabba, pannaya sacchikatabba?
ne37:225.2: Asavanam khaye nanam pannaya veditabbam, pannaya ca sacchikatabban”ti.
ne37:230.1: Ayasmato ca sariputtassa carikadasamam veyyakaranam katabbanti.
ne37:260.1: “Tathagato, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho rupassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto sammasambuddhoti vuccati.
ne37:260.2: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, pannavimutto rupassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto pannavimuttoti vuccati.
ne37:261.4: vinnanassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto sammasambuddhoti vuccati.
ne37:261.5: Bhikkhupi, bhikkhave, pannavimutto vinnanassa nibbida viraga nirodha anupada vimutto pannavimuttoti vuccati.
ne37:262.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayaso kim nanakaranam tathagatassa arahato sammasambuddhassa pannavimuttena bhikkhunati?
ne37:263.1: Tathagato, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppadeta, asanjatassa maggassa sanjaneta, anakkhatassa maggassa akkhata, maggannu maggavidu maggakovido, magganuga ca, bhikkhave, etarahi savaka viharanti paccha samannagata.
ne37:263.2: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayam adhippayaso, idam nanakaranam tathagatassa arahato sammasambuddhassa pannavimuttena bhikkhuna”ti.
ne37:267.1: “Channamativassati”ti sankileso, “vivatam nativassati”ti vasana, “tasma channam vivaretha, evam tam nativassati”ti ayam sankileso ca vasana ca.
ne37:268.3: Tamo tamaparayano tamo jotiparayano joti tamaparayano joti jotiparayano”ti.
ne37:268.4: Tattha yo ca puggalo joti tamaparayano yo ca puggalo tamo tamaparayano, ime dve puggala sankilesabhagiya, yo ca puggalo tamo jotiparayano yo ca puggalo joti jotiparayano, ime dve puggala vasanabhagiya.
ne37:274.1: “Yanca, bhikkhave, ceteti, yanca pakappeti, yanca anuseti.
ne37:274.2: Arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya, arammane sati patittha vinnanassa hoti, tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti, ayatim punabbhavabhinibbattiya sati ayatim jatijaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
ne37:275.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti, no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti.
ne37:275.2: Arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya, arammane sati patittha vinnanassa hoti, tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti, ayatim punabbhavabhinibbattiya sati ayatim jatijaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti”ti.
ne37:276.1: “Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti, no ca pakappeti, no ca anuseti.
ne37:276.2: Arammanametam na hoti vinnanassa thitiya, arammane asati patittha vinnanassa na hoti, tasmim appatitthite vinnane avirulhe ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti na hoti, ayatim punabbhavabhinibbattiya asati ayatim jatijaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
ne37:276.3: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti”ti, ayam nibbedho.
ne37:278.1: “‘Samuddo samuddo’ti kho, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano bhasati.
ne37:278.4: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, purisassa samuddo, tassa rupamayo vego”ti.
ne37:279.1: “Yo tam rupamayam vegam sahati ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, atari cakkhusamuddam saumim savattam sagaham sarakkhasam tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano”ti.
ne37:280.5: mano, bhikkhave, purisassa samuddo tassa dhammamayo vego”ti.

ne37:281.4: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha—
ne37:284.1: “Chayime, bhikkhave, balisa lokasmim anayaya sattanam byabadhaya paninam.
ne37:284.3: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya, tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaliso marassa anayam apanno, byasanam apanno, yathakamakaraniyo papimato.
ne37:285.5: manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya, tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
ne37:285.6: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaliso marassa anayam apanno, byasanam apanno, yathakamakaraniyo papimato”ti.
ne37:286.1: Santi ca, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya, tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaliso marassa, abhedi balisam, paribhedi balisam, na anayam apanno, na byasanam apanno, na yathakamakaraniyo papimato.
ne37:287.2: manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya, tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati, najjhosaya titthati.
ne37:287.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaliso marassa, abhedi balisam, paribhedi balisam, na anayam apanno, na byasanam apanno, na yathakamakaraniyo papimato”ti.
ne37:288.1: Tattha katamam sankilesabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca asekkhabhagiyanca suttam?

ne37:292.2: Ye va pana keci samana va brahmana va vibhavena bhavassa nissaranamahamsu, sabbe te ‘anissata bhavasma’ti vadami.
ne37:294.1: “Lokamimam passa, puthu avijjaya pareta bhuta bhutarata, bhava aparimutta, ye hi keci bhava sabbadhi sabbatthataya, sabbe te bhava anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma”ti.
ne37:299.3: Anusotagami patisotagami thitatto tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano”ti.

ne37:299.5: Tattha yoyam puggalo patisotagami yo ca thitatto, ime dve puggala nibbedhabhagiya.
ne37:299.6: Tattha yoyam puggalo tinno parangato thale titthati brahmano, ayam asekkho.
ne37:300.1: Tattha katamam sankilesabhagiyanca vasanabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca suttam?
ne37:301.1: Chalabhijatiko atthi puggalo kanho kanhabhijatiko kanham dhammam abhijayati, atthi puggalo kanho kanhabhijatiko sukkam dhammam abhijayati, atthi puggalo kanho kanhabhijatiko akanham asukkam akanhaasukkavipakam accantadittham nibbanam aradheti, atthi puggalo sukko sukkabhijatiko kanham dhammam abhijayati, atthi puggalo sukko sukkabhijatiko sukkam dhammam abhijayati, atthi puggalo sukko sukkabhijatiko akanham asukkam akanhaasukkavipakam accantadittham nibbanam aradheti.
ne37:302.1: Tattha yo ca puggalo kanho kanhabhijatiko kanham dhammam abhijayati, yo ca puggalo sukko sukkabhijatiko kanham dhammam abhijayati, ime dve puggala sankilesabhagiya.
ne37:303.1: Tattha yo ca puggalo kanho kanhabhijatiko sukkam dhammam abhijayati, yo ca puggalo sukko sukkabhijatiko sukkam dhammam abhijayati, ime dve puggala vasanabhagiya.
ne37:304.1: Tattha yo ca puggalo kanho kanhabhijatiko akanham asukkam akanhaasukkavipakam accantadittham nibbanam aradheti, yo ca puggalo sukko sukkabhijatiko akanham asukkam akanhaasukkavipakam accantadittham nibbanam aradheti, ime dve puggala nibbedhabhagiya, idam sankilesabhagiyanca vasanabhagiyanca nibbedhabhagiyanca suttam.
ne37:305.3: Atthi kammam kanham kanhavipakam, atthi kammam sukkam sukkavipakam, atthi kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam, atthi kammam akanham asukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammuttamam kammasettham kammakkhayaya samvattati”.
ne37:306.1: Tattha yanca kammam kanham kanhavipakam, yanca kammam kanhasukkam kanhasukkavipakam, ayam sankileso.
ne37:306.2: Yanca kammam sukkam sukkavipakam, ayam vasana.
ne37:306.3: Yanca kammam akanham asukkam akanhaasukkavipakam kammuttamam kammasettham kammakkhayaya samvattati, ayam nibbedho.
ne37:311.1: “Punnani karitvana, sagga saggam vajanti katapunna”ti vasana.
ne37:312.3: Yo ca agarasma anagariyam pabbajitesu civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam pariccajati, yo ca agarasma anagariyam pabbajitesu sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanan”ti.
ne37:312.4: Tattha yo agarasma anagariyam pabbajitesu civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharam pariccajati, ayam vasana.
ne37:313.1: Yo agarasma anagariyam pabbajitesu sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam, ayam nibbedho.
ne37:314.1: Tattha tanhasankilesabhagiyam suttam tanhapakkheneva niddisitabbam tihi tanhahi—
ne37:314.3: Yena yena va pana vatthuna ajjhosita, tena teneva niddisitabbam, tassa vittharo chattimsatanhajaliniya vicaritani.
ne37:315.1: Tattha ditthisankilesabhagiyam suttam ditthipakkheneva niddisitabbam ucchedasassatena, yena yena va pana vatthuna ditthivasena abhinivisati “idameva saccam moghamannan”ti, tena teneva niddisitabbam, tassa vittharo dvasatthiditthigatani.
ne37:316.1: Tattha duccaritasankilesabhagiyam suttam cetanaya cetasikakammena niddisitabbam tihi duccaritehi—
ne37:316.2: kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, tassa vittharo dasaakusalakammapatha.
ne37:317.1: Tattha tanhavodanabhagiyam suttam samathena niddisitabbam, ditthivodanabhagiyam suttam vipassanaya niddisitabbam, duccaritavodanabhagiyam suttam sucaritena niddisitabbam—
ne37:317.5: Tatha nibbatte samsare kayaduccaritam kayasucaritam vaciduccaritam vacisucaritam manoduccaritam manosucaritam imina asubhena kammavipakena idam balalakkhanam nibbattatiti.
ne37:318.1: Imina subhena kammavipakena idam mahapurisalakkhanam nibbattatiti.
ne37:319.1: Tattha sankilesabhagiyam suttam catuhi kilesabhumihi niddisitabbam—
ne37:319.3: Sanusayassa pariyutthanam jayati, pariyutthito samyujjati, samyujjanto upadiyati, upadanapaccaya bhavo, bhavapaccaya jati, jatipaccaya jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
ne37:319.4: Imahi catuhi kilesabhumihi sabbe kilesa sangaham samosaranam gacchanti, idam sankilesabhagiyam suttam.
ne37:320.1: Vasanabhagiyam suttam tihi sucaritehi niddisitabbam, nibbedhabhagiyam suttam catuhi saccehi niddisitabbam, asekkhabhagiyam suttam tihi dhammehi niddisitabbam—
ne37:321.2: Lokiyam lokuttaram lokiyanca lokuttaranca, sattadhitthanam dhammadhitthanam sattadhitthananca dhammadhitthananca, nanam neyyam nananca neyyanca, dassanam bhavana dassananca bhavana ca, sakavacanam paravacanam sakavacananca paravacananca, visajjaniyam avisajjaniyam visajjaniyanca avisajjaniyanca, kammam vipako kammanca vipako ca, kusalam akusalam kusalanca akusalanca, anunnatam patikkhittam anunnatanca patikkhittanca, thavo cati.
ne37:326.3: Labho alabho, yaso ayaso, ninda pasamsa, sukham dukkham.
ne37:332.1: “Laddhana manusattam dve, kiccam akiccameva ca”ti dve gatha.
ne37:332.2: Yam iha “sukiccam ceva punnani”ti ca “punnani karitvana, sagga saggam vajanti katapunna”ti ca.
ne37:333.1: Yam iha “samyojanavippahanam va”ti ca “samyojanappahana, jaramarana vippamuccanti”ti ca, idam lokuttaram.
ne37:334.1: “Vinnane ce, bhikkhave, ahare sati namarupassa avakkanti hoti, namarupassa avakkantiya sati punabbhavo hoti, punabbhave sati jati hoti, jatiya sati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
ne37:334.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, maharukkho, tassa yani ceva mulani adhogamani yani ca tiriyangamani, sabbani tani uddham ojam abhiharanti.
ne37:334.4: Evam hi so, bhikkhave, maharukkho tadaharo tadupadano ciram dighamaddhanam tittheyya.
ne37:334.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, vinnane ahare sati namarupassa avakkanti hoti sabbam …pe…
ne37:335.1: “Vinnane ce, bhikkhave, ahare asati namarupassa avakkanti na hoti, namarupassa avakkantiya asati punabbhavo na hoti, punabbhave asati jati na hoti, jatiya asati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
ne37:335.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, maharukkho atha puriso agaccheyya kuddalapitakam adaya, so tam rukkham mule chindeyya, mule chetva palikhaneyya, palikhanitva mulani uddhareyya antamaso usiranalimattanipi.
ne37:335.4: So tam rukkham khandakhandikam chindeyya, khandakhandikam chinditva phaleyya, phaletva sakalikam sakalikam kareyya, sakalikam sakalikam karitva vatatape visoseyya, vatatape visosetva aggina daheyya, aggina dahetva masim kareyya, masim karitva mahavate va ophuneyya, nadiya va sighasotaya pavaheyya, evam hi so, bhikkhave, maharukkho ucchinnamulo assa talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
ne37:335.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, vinnane ahare asati namarupassa avakkanti na hoti, namarupassa avakkantiya asati sabbam …pe…
ne37:341.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagatam kalyanamittam api viveciyamanena panamiyamanena gale pisanamajjamanena yavajivam na vijahitabbam.
ne37:341.3: Piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca vatta ca vacanakkhamo ca gambhiranca katham katta hoti, no ca atthane niyojeti.
ne37:341.7: Idam vatvana sugato, athaparam etadavoca sattha—
ne37:356.1: So kayepi cittam samodahati, cittepi kayam samodahati, kaye sukhasannanca lahusannanca okkamitva upasampajja viharati.
ne37:367.1: “Catunnam, bhikkhave, ariyasaccanam ananubodha appativedha evamidam dighamaddhanam sandhavitam samsaritam mamanceva tumhakanca …pe…
ne37:367.2: tayidam, bhikkhave, dukkham ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam anubuddham patividdham.
ne37:367.3: Ucchinna bhavatanha, khina bhavanetti, natthi dani punabbhavo”ti.
ne37:367.5: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha—
ne37:371.2: Rupam aniccam, vedana anicca, sanna anicca, sankhara anicca, vinnanam aniccanti.
ne37:372.1: Evam janam evam passam ariyasavako “rupam aniccan”ti passati,
ne37:373.1: So parimuccati rupena, parimuccati vedanaya, parimuccati sannaya, parimuccati sankharehi, parimuccati vinnanamha, parimuccati dukkhasmati vadamiti.
ne37:374.3: “Atha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiya”ti idam nananca neyyanca.
ne37:375.3: “Atha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiya”ti idam nananca neyyanca.
ne37:376.3: “Atha nibbindati dukkhe esa maggo visuddhiya”ti idam nananca neyyanca.
ne37:377.1: “Ye hi keci, sona, samana va brahmana va aniccena rupena dukkhena viparinamadhammena ‘seyyohamasmi’ti va samanupassanti, ‘sadisohamasmi’ti va samanupassanti, ‘hinohamasmi’ti va samanupassanti.
ne37:377.6: aniccena vinnanena dukkhena viparinamadhammena ‘seyyohamasmi’ti va samanupassanti, ‘sadisohamasmi’ti va samanupassanti, ‘hinohamasmi’ti va samanupassanti, kimannatra yathabhutassa adassana”ti.
ne37:378.1: “Ye ca kho keci, sona, samana va brahmana va aniccena rupena dukkhena viparinamadhammena ‘seyyohamasmi’tipi na samanupassanti, ‘sadisohamasmi’tipi na samanupassanti, ‘hinohamasmi’tipi na samanupassanti, kimannatra yathabhutassa dassana.
ne37:378.5: aniccena vinnanena dukkhena viparinamadhammena ‘seyyohamasmi’tipi na samanupassanti, ‘sadisohamasmi’tipi na samanupassanti, ‘hinohamasmi’tipi na samanupassanti, kimannatra yathabhutassa dassana”ti.
ne37:385.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, sotapattiyangehi samannagato ariyasavako akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya ‘khinanirayomhi, khinatiracchanayoni, khinapettivisayo, khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano, sattakkhattuparamam deve ca manusse ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karissami’ti.
ne37:385.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa tathagate saddha nivittha patitthita virulha mulajata asamhariya samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim saha dhammena, dhamme kho pana nittham gato hoti, svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi, yadidam madanimmadano …pe…
ne37:385.4: nirodho nibbanam, saha dhammiya kho panassa honti ittha kanta piya manapa gihi ceva pabbajita ca.
ne37:385.5: Ariyakantehi kho pana silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammasehi bhujissehi vinnuppasatthehi aparamatthehi samadhisamvattanikehi.
ne37:385.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi sotapattiyangehi samannagato ariyasavako akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya ‘khinanirayomhi, khinatiracchanayoni, khinapettivisayo, khinapayaduggativinipato, sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano, sattakkhattuparamam deve ca manusse ca sandhavitva samsaritva dukkhassantam karissami’”ti.
ne37:390.3: Anabhijjha dhammapadam, abyapado dhammapadam, sammasati dhammapadam, sammasamadhi dhammapadam, imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari dhammapadani”ti.
ne37:391.4: Panca sangatigo bhikkhu, oghatinnoti vuccati”ti ayam bhavana.
ne37:392.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anabhisametassa dukkhassa ariyasaccassa abhisamayaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati,
ne37:392.7: dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya ariyasaccassa abhisamayaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
ne37:393.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti …pe…
ne37:394.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati, khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanati.
ne37:399.1: “Tinimani, bhikkhave, balassa balalakkhanani balanimittani balapadanani, yehi balam baloti pare sanjananti.
ne37:399.3: Balo, bhikkhave, duccintitacinti ca hoti, dubbhasitabhasi ca hoti, dukkatakammakari ca hoti.
ne37:399.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini balassa balalakkhanani balanimittani balapadanani.
ne37:400.1: Tinimani, bhikkhave, panditassa panditalakkhanani panditanimittani panditapadanani, yehi panditam panditoti pare sanjananti.
ne37:400.3: Pandito, bhikkhave, sucintitacinti ca hoti, subhasitabhasi ca hoti, sukatakammakari ca hoti.
ne37:400.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini panditassa panditalakkhanani panditanimittani panditapadanani”ti.
ne37:405.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imam gatham abhasi—
ne37:407.1: Bhasitaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittina asurindena gathaya asura anumodimsu, deva tunhi ahesum.
ne37:407.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkam devanamindam etadavoca—
ne37:407.4: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo imam gatham abhasi—
ne37:409.1: Bhasitaya kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devanamindena gathaya deva anumodimsu, asura tunhi ahesum.
ne37:409.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo vepacittim asurindam etadavoca—
ne37:409.4: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo imam gatham abhasi—
ne37:411.1: Bhasitaya kho pana, bhikkhave, vepacittina asurindena gathaya asura anumodimsu, deva tunhi ahesum.
ne37:411.2: Atha kho vepacitti asurindo sakkam devanamindam etadavoca—
ne37:411.4: Evam vutte, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo ima gathayo abhasi—
ne37:418.1: Bhasitasu kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkena devanamindena gathasu deva anumodimsu, asura tunhi ahesun”ti.
ne37:420.1: Yanca pattam yanca pattabbam ubhayametam rajanukinnam aturassanusikkhato.
ne37:420.2: Ye ca sikkhasara silam vatam jivitam brahmacariyam upatthanasara, ayameko anto.
ne37:420.3: Ye ca evamvadino evamditthino “natthi kamesu doso”ti, ayam dutiyo anto.
ne37:420.4: Iccete ubho anta katasivaddhana katasiyo ditthim vaddhenti.
ne37:420.5: Ete ubho ante anabhinnaya oliyanti eke atidhavanti eketi.
ne37:421.1: Ye ca kho te ubho ante abhinnaya tatra ca na ahesum, tena ca amannimsu, vattam tesam natthi pannapanayati.
ne37:422.2: idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi “kesam nu kho piyo atta, kesam appiyo atta”ti.
ne37:422.4: “ye ca kho keci kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti, tesam appiyo atta.
ne37:422.5: Kincapi te evam vadeyyum ‘piyo no atta’ti, atha kho tesam appiyo atta.
ne37:422.7: Yam hi appiyo appiyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti, tasma tesam appiyo atta.
ne37:422.8: Ye ca kho keci kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti, tesam piyo atta.
ne37:422.9: Kincapi te evam vadeyyum ‘appiyo no atta’ti, atha kho tesam piyo atta.
ne37:423.1: “Evametam, maharaja, evametam, maharaja, ye hi keci, maharaja, kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti tasma tesam appiyo atta.
ne37:423.2: Kincapi te evam vadeyyum ‘piyo no atta’ti, atha kho tesam appiyo atta.
ne37:423.4: Yam hi, maharaja, appiyo appiyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti, tasma tesam appiyo atta.
ne37:423.5: Ye ca kho keci maharaja kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti, tesam piyo atta.
ne37:423.6: Kincapi te evam vadeyyum ‘appiyo no atta’ti, atha kho tesam piyo atta.
ne37:423.8: Yam hi, maharaja, piyo piyassa kareyya, tam te attanava attano karonti, tasma tesam piyo attati.
ne37:430.1: Panhe pucchite idam abhinneyyam, idam parinneyyam, idam pahatabbam, idam bhavetabbam, idam sacchikatabbam, ime dhamma evangahita idam phalam nibbattayanti.
ne37:430.2: Tesam evangahitanam ayamattho iti idam visajjaniyam.
ne37:430.3: “Ularo buddho bhagava”ti buddhaularatam dhammasvakkhatatam sanghasuppatipattinca ekamseneva niddise.
ne37:430.4: “Sabbe sankhara anicca”ti “sabbe sankhara dukkha”ti “sabbe dhamma anatta”ti ekamseneva niddise.
ne37:434.1: Ettako bhagava silakkhandhe samadhikkhandhe pannakkhandhe vimuttikkhandhe vimuttinanadassanakkhandhe iriyayam pabhave hitesitayam karunayam iddhiyanti.
ne37:435.1: “Tathagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammasambuddhassa loke uppada tinnam ratananam uppado buddharatanassa dhammaratanassa sangharatanassa”.
ne37:436.3: “Pubba, bhikkhave, koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sakim nirayam sakim tiracchanayonim sakim pettivisayam sakim asurayonim sakim deve sakim manusse sandhavitam samsaritam”.
ne37:436.6: Duvidha buddhanam bhagavantanam desana attupanayika ca parupanayika ca.
ne37:436.9: Yatha bhagava kokalikam bhikkhum arabbha annataram bhikkhum evamaha—
ne37:437.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati abbuda niraya, evameko nirabbudo nirayo.
ne37:437.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati nirabbuda niraya, evameko ababo nirayo.
ne37:437.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ababa niraya, evameko atato nirayo.
ne37:437.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati atata niraya, evameko ahaho nirayo.
ne37:437.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ahaha niraya, evameko kumudo nirayo.
ne37:437.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati kumuda niraya, evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
ne37:437.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati sogandhika niraya, evameko uppalako nirayo.
ne37:437.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati uppalaka niraya, evameko pundariko nirayo.
ne37:437.11: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati pundarika niraya, evameko padumo nirayo.
ne37:437.12: Padume pana, bhikkhu, niraye kokaliko bhikkhu upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
ne37:437.13: Yam va pana kinci bhagava aha—
ne37:438.1: Tattha katamam visajjaniyanca avisajjaniyanca, yada so upako ajivako bhagavantam aha—
ne37:442.3: Katamo asavakkhayo, ragakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti visajjaniyam.
ne37:444.1: Passati bhagava dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte cavamane upapajjamane evam sabbam …pe…
ne37:450.1: “Puna caparam, bhikkhave, balam pithasamarulham va mancasamarulham va chamayam va semanam yanissa pubbe papakani kammani katani kayena duccaritani vacaya duccaritani manasa duccaritani, tanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti.
ne37:450.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahatam pabbatakutanam chaya sayanhasamayam pathaviyam olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti.
ne37:450.3: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, balam pithasamarulham va mancasamarulham va chamayam va semanam yanissa pubbe papakani kammani katani kayena duccaritani vacaya duccaritani manasa duccaritani, tanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti.
ne37:450.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, balassa evam hoti ‘akatam vata me kalyanam, akatam kusalam, akatam bhiruttanam.
ne37:450.5: Katam papam, katam luddam, katam kibbisam, yavata bho akatakalyananam akatakusalanam akatabhiruttananam katapapanam kataluddanam katakibbisanam gati, tam gatim pecca gacchami’ti, so socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati sammoham apajjatiti.
ne37:451.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, panditam pithasamarulham va mancasamarulham va chamayam va semanam yanissa pubbe kalyanani kammani katani kayena sucaritani vacaya sucaritani manasa sucaritani, tanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti.
ne37:451.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahatam pabbatakutanam chaya sayanhasamayam pathaviyam olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti.
ne37:451.3: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, panditam pithasamarulham va mancasamarulham va chamayam va semanam yanissa pubbe kalyanani kammani katani kayena sucaritani vacaya sucaritani manasa sucaritani, tanissa tamhi samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti.
ne37:451.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, panditassa ‘evam hoti akatam vata me papam, akatam luddam, akatam kibbisam.
ne37:451.5: Katam kalyanam, katam kusalam, katam bhiruttanam, yavata bho akatapapanam akataluddanam akatakibbisanam katakalyananam katakusalanam katabhiruttananam gati, tam gatim pecca gacchami’ti, so na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattalim kandati na sammoham apajjati, ‘katam me punnam, akatam papam, ya bhavissati gati akatapapassa akataluddassa akatakibbisassa katapunnassa katakusalassa katabhiruttanassa, tam pecca bhave gatim paccanubhavissami’ti vippatisaro na jayati.
ne37:451.6: Avippatisarino kho, bhikkhave, itthiya va purisassa va gihino va pabbajitassa va bhaddakam maranam bhaddika kalankiriyati vadami”ti.
ne37:454.1: “Labha vo, bhikkhave, suladdham vo, bhikkhave, khano vo, bhikkhave, patiladdho brahmacariyavasaya.
ne37:454.2: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, chaphassayatanika nama niraya.
ne37:454.3: Tattha yam kinci cakkhuna rupam passati anittharupamyeva passati, no ittharupam.
ne37:455.5: yam kinci manasa dhammam vijanati anitthadhammamyeva vijanati, no itthadhammam.
ne37:455.8: Labha vo, bhikkhave, suladdham vo, bhikkhave, khano vo, bhikkhave, patiladdho brahmacariyavasaya.
ne37:456.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, chaphassayatanika nama sagga.
ne37:456.2: Tattha yam kinci cakkhuna rupam passati ittharupamyeva passati, no anittharupam.
ne37:456.9: manasa dhammam vijanati itthadhammamyeva vijanati, no anitthadhammam.
ne37:456.12: Labha vo, bhikkhave, suladdham vo, bhikkhave, khano vo, bhikkhave, patiladdho brahmacariyavasaya”ti.
ne37:464.1: “Ma, bhikkhave, punnanam bhayittha, sukhassetam, bhikkhave, adhivacanam itthassa kantassa piyassa manapassa yadidam punnani.
ne37:464.2: Abhijanami kho panaham, bhikkhave, digharattam katanam punnanam ittham kantam piyam manapam vipakam paccanubhutam, satta vassani mettacittam bhavetva satta samvattavivattakappe na imam lokam punaragamasim.
ne37:464.3: Samvattamane sudaham, bhikkhave, kappe abhassarupago homi.
ne37:464.5: Tatra sudaham, bhikkhave, brahma homi mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti.
ne37:464.6: Chattimsakkhattum kho panaham, bhikkhave, sakko ahosim devanamindo, anekasatakkhattum raja ahosim cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato, ko pana vado padesarajjassa?
ne37:464.8: ‘kissa nu kho me idam kammassa phalam, kissa kammassa vipako, yenaham etarahi evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo’ti.
ne37:464.10: ‘tinnam kho me idam kammanam phalam, tinnam kammanam vipako.
ne37:464.14: Tattha yanca danam yo ca damo yo ca samyamo, idam kammam.
ne37:464.15: Yo tappaccaya vipako paccanubhuto, ayam vipako.
ne37:465.2: Tattha ye dhamma appayukadighayukataya samvattanti bahvabadhaappabadhataya appesakkhamahesakkhataya dubbannasuvannataya nicakulikauccakulikataya appabhogamahabhogataya duppannapannavantataya ca samvattanti, idam kammam.
ne37:471.3: Alobho kusalamulam, adoso kusalamulam, amoho kusalamulam.
ne37:471.6: “Vijja, bhikkhave, pubbangama kusalanam dhammanam samapattiya anudeva hiri ottappanca”ti.
ne37:479.2: Lobho akusalamulam, doso akusalamulam, moho akusalamulam.
ne37:488.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu, kayakammavacikammena samannagato kusalena parisuddhajivo.
ne37:488.4: Araddhaviriyo kho pana hoti thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam bhavanaya sacchikiriyaya.
ne37:488.5: Pannava kho pana hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
ne37:488.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam tini karaniyani”ti.
ne37:489.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma pabbajitena abhinham paccavekkhitabba”ti.
ne37:500.5: Etesu dhammesu thito catusu, dhamme thito paralokam na bhaye”ti, idam anunnatam.
ne37:503.2: Vacisamacarampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampi.
ne37:503.4: pariyesanampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampi.
ne37:504.1: Kayasamacarampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampi”ti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam.
ne37:504.2: Yatharupanca kho kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupo kayasamacaro na sevitabbo.
ne37:504.3: Tattha yam janna kayasamacaram “imam kho me kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti”ti, evarupo kayasamacaro sevitabbo.
ne37:504.4: “Kayasamacarampaham devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampi”ti iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
ne37:505.2: pariyesanampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampi”ti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam.
ne37:505.3: Yatharupanca kho pariyesanam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupa pariyesana na sevitabba.
ne37:505.4: Tattha yam janna pariyesanam “imam kho me pariyesanam sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti”ti, evarupa pariyesana sevitabba.
ne37:506.1: “Pariyesanampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampi”ti iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
ne37:511.3: Yavata, bhikkhave, satta apada va dvipada va catuppada va bahuppada va rupino va arupino va sannino va asannino va nevasanninasannino va, tathagato tesam aggamakkhayati setthamakkhayati pavaramakkhayati, yadidam araham sammasambuddho.
ne37:511.4: Yavata, bhikkhave, dhammanam pannattisankhatanam va asankhatanam va, virago tesam dhammanam aggamakkhayati setthamakkhayati pavaramakkhayati, yadidam madanimmadano …pe…
ne37:511.6: Yavata, bhikkhave, sanghanam pannatti gananam pannatti mahajanasannipatanam pannatti, tathagatasavakasangho tesam aggamakkhayati setthamakkhayati pavaramakkhayati, yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala …pe…
ne37:519.1: Tattha lokiyam suttam dvihi suttehi niddisitabbam sankilesabhagiyena ca vasanabhagiyena ca.
ne37:519.2: Lokuttarampi suttam tihi suttehi niddisitabbam dassanabhagiyena ca bhavanabhagiyena ca asekkhabhagiyena ca.
ne37:519.4: Yasmim sutte yam yam padam dissati sankilesabhagiyam va vasanabhagiyam va, tena tena lokiyanti niddisitabbam, dassanabhagiyam va bhavanabhagiyam va asekkhabhagiyam va yam yam padam dissati tena tena lokuttaranti niddisitabbam.
ne37:520.1: Vasanabhagiyam suttam sankilesabhagiyassa suttassa nigghataya, dassanabhagiyam suttam vasanabhagiyassa suttassa nigghataya, bhavanabhagiyam suttam dassanabhagiyassa suttassa patinissaggaya, asekkhabhagiyam suttam bhavanabhagiyassa suttassa patinissaggaya, asekkhabhagiyam suttam ditthadhammasukhaviharattham.
ne37:521.1: Lokuttaram suttam sattadhitthanam chabbisatiya puggalehi niddisitabbam, te tihi suttehi samanvesitabba dassanabhagiyena bhavanabhagiyena asekkhabhagiyena cati.
ne37:522.1: Tattha dassanabhagiyam suttam pancahi puggalehi niddisitabbam ekabijina kolankolena sattakkhattuparamena saddhanusarina dhammanusarina cati, dassanabhagiyam suttam imehi pancahi puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:522.2: Bhavanabhagiyam suttam dvadasahi puggalehi niddisitabbam sakadagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipannena, sakadagamina, anagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipannena, anagamina, antara parinibbayina, upahacca parinibbayina, asankharaparinibbayina, sasankharaparinibbayina, uddhamsotena akanitthagamina, saddhavimuttena, ditthippattena, kayasakkhina cati, bhavanabhagiyam suttam imehi dvadasahi puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:522.3: Asekkhabhagiyam suttam navahi puggalehi niddisitabbam saddhavimuttena, pannavimuttena, sunnatavimuttena, animittavimuttena, appanihitavimuttena, ubhatobhagavimuttena samasisina paccekabuddhasammasambuddhehi cati, asekkhabhagiyam suttam imehi navahi puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:522.4: Evam lokuttaram suttam sattadhitthanam imehi chabbisatiya puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:523.1: Lokiyam suttam sattadhitthanam ekunavisatiya puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:523.2: Te caritehi niddittha samanvesitabba keci ragacarita, keci dosacarita, keci mohacarita, keci ragacarita ca dosacarita ca, keci ragacarita ca mohacarita ca, keci dosacarita ca mohacarita ca, keci ragacarita ca dosacarita ca mohacarita ca, ragamukhe thito ragacarito, ragamukhe thito dosacarito, ragamukhe thito mohacarito, ragamukhe thito ragacarito ca dosacarito ca mohacarito ca, dosamukhe thito dosacarito, dosamukhe thito mohacarito, dosamukhe thito ragacarito, dosamukhe thito ragacarito ca dosacarito ca mohacarito ca, mohamukhe thito mohacarito, mohamukhe thito ragacarito mohamukhe thito dosacarito, mohamukhe thito ragacarito ca dosacarito ca mohacarito cati, lokiyam suttam sattadhitthanam imehi ekunavisatiya puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:524.1: Vasanabhagiyam suttam silavantehi niddisitabbam, te silavanto panca puggala pakatisilam samadanasilam cittappasado samatho vipassana cati, vasanabhagiyam suttam imehi pancahi puggalehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:525.1: Lokuttaram suttam dhammadhitthanam tihi suttehi niddisitabbam dassanabhagiyena bhavanabhagiyena asekkhabhagiyena ca.
ne37:526.1: Lokiyanca lokuttaranca sattadhitthananca dhammadhitthananca ubhayena niddisitabbam, nanam pannaya niddisitabbam pannindriyena pannabalena adhipannasikkhaya dhammavicayasambojjhangena sammaditthiya tiranaya santiranaya dhamme nanena anvaye nanena khaye nanena anuppade nanena anannatannassamitindriyena annindriyena annatavindriyena cakkhuna vijjaya buddhiya bhuriya medhaya, yam yam va pana labbhati, tena tena pannadhivacanena niddisitabbam.
ne37:527.1: Neyyam atitanagatapaccuppannehi ajjhattikabahirehi hinappanitehi durasantikehi sankhatasankhatehi kusalakusalabyakatehi sankhepato va chahi arammanehi niddisitabbam.
ne37:527.2: Nananca neyyanca tadubhayena niddisitabbam, pannapi arammanabhuta neyyam, yam kinci arammanabhutam ajjhattikam va bahiram va, sabbam tam sankhatena asankhatena ca niddisitabbam.
ne37:528.1: Dassanam bhavana sakavacanam paravacanam visajjaniyam avisajjaniyam kammam vipakoti sabbattha tadubhayam sutte yatha niddittham, tatha upadharayitva labbhamanato niddisitabbam, yam va pana kinci bhagava annataravacanam bhasati, sabbam tam yathaniddittham dharayitabbam.
ne37:529.1: Duvidho hetu yanca kammam ye ca kilesa, samudayo kilesa.
ne37:529.3: Samudayo sankilesabhagiyena ca vasanabhagiyena ca suttena niddisitabbo.
ne37:529.4: Tattha kusalam catuhi suttehi niddisitabbam vasanabhagiyena dassanabhagiyena bhavanabhagiyena asekkhabhagiyena ca.
ne37:529.7: Anunnatam bhagavato anunnataya niddisitabbam, tam pancavidham samvaro pahanam bhavana sacchikiriya kappiyanulomoti, yam dissati tasu tasu bhumisu, tam kappiyanulomena niddisitabbam.
ne37:529.11: So pancavidhena veditabbo bhagavato dhammassa ariyasanghassa ariyadhammanam sikkhaya lokiyagunasampattiyati.
ne37:530.1: Indriyabhumi navahi padehi niddisitabba, kilesabhumi navahi padehi niddisitabba, evametani attharasa padani honti nava padani kusalani nava padani akusalaniti, tathahi vuttam “attharasa mulapada kuhim datthabba, sasanappatthane”ti.
ne37:531.6: Ettavata samatta netti ya ayasmata mahakaccayanena bhasita bhagavata anumodita mulasangitiyam sangitati.
